org.primaresearch.maths.geometry

Class Polygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.primaresearch.maths.geometry.Polygon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Polygon
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Polygon class holding a list of points and providing some geometric operations.
    Author:
    clc
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Polygon() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPoint(int x, int y)
      Adds a point at the end of the polygon.
      double calculateLength()
      Calculates the perimeter of this polygon
      Polygon clone()
      Creates a deep copy of this polygon.
      Rect getBoundingBox()
      Returns the bounding box of the polygon (the user has to make sure that setBoundingBoxOutdated is called when points are changed manually).
      Point getPoint(int index)
      Returns the polygon point at the given index.
      int getSize()
      Returns the number of points of this polygon.
      void insertPoint(int insertAfter, Point p)
      Inserts a polygon point at the given position.
      boolean isPointInside(int x, int y)
      Checks if the given point is inside the polygon.
      void removePoint(Point p)
      Removes the given point from the polygon.
      void setBoundingBoxOutdated()
      Mark the bounding box as 'to be updated'.

    • Method Detail

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Returns the number of points of this polygon.

      • getPoint

        public Point getPoint(int index)
        Returns the polygon point at the given index.

      • addPoint

        public void addPoint(int x,
            int y)
        Adds a point at the end of the polygon.

      • insertPoint

        public void insertPoint(int insertAfter,
               Point p)
        Inserts a polygon point at the given position.
        Parameters:
        insertAfter - Index of point before the new point.
        p - New point

      • removePoint

        public void removePoint(Point p)
        Removes the given point from the polygon.

      • getBoundingBox

        public Rect getBoundingBox()
        Returns the bounding box of the polygon (the user has to make sure that setBoundingBoxOutdated is called when points are changed manually).
        Returns:
        Rectangle

      • setBoundingBoxOutdated

        public void setBoundingBoxOutdated()
        Mark the bounding box as 'to be updated'.

      • isPointInside

        public boolean isPointInside(int x,
                    int y)
        Checks if the given point is inside the polygon. Note that the polygon line does not count as inside.

      • calculateLength

        public double calculateLength()
        Calculates the perimeter of this polygon
        Returns:
        Length (0.0 if not a polygon)

      • clone

        public Polygon clone()
        Creates a deep copy of this polygon.
        Overrides:
        clone in class java.lang.Object
